      • setLeft

        void setLeft(double speed)
        Set the speed of the motors on the left side of the robot.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed at which the motors move

      • setRight

        void setRight(double speed)
        Set the speed of the motors on the right side of the robot.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed at which the motors move

      • drive

        void drive(double speed)
        Move the robot. Only go forward and back.
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed of the motors

      • drive

        void drive(double speedLeft,
         double speedRight)
        Move the robot. Each side can have a different speed to allow for turning.
        Parameters:
        speedLeft - The speed of the left motors
        speedRight - The speed of the right motors

        Halt the motors
